europeana:record.dc:title: Redescription of Oswaldella antarctica (Jäderholm, 1904) (Cnidaria Hydrozoa) with notes on related species (Notes on Antarctic hydroids, I)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Peña Cantero A.L.
Vervoort W.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Cnidaria; Hydrozoa; hydroids; Antarctic; redescription of Oswaldella antarctica
new species
europeana:record.dc:description: Jäderholm's type of Schizotricha antarctica, collected by the Swedish Antarctic Expedition 1901-1903, is redescribed from a syntype in the collections of the Swedish National Museum, Stockholm. The type lot of that species proved to be composite, the material best resembling Jäderholm's (1904, 1905) descriptions and figures has been designated as the syntype. There are two more species in the type lot, that have also been described, but are too poorly represented to be either recognized as one of the described species of Oswaldella or to merit a new specific name; they have been indicated as Oswaldella spec. 1 and spec. 2. Resumen: Se ha revisado y redescrito el material tipo de Schizotricha antarctica Jäderholm, 1904, recogido durante la Swedish Antarctic Expedition 1901-1903 y depositado en el Swedish Museum of Natural History de Stockholm. Dicho material ha resultado estar compuesto por tres especies. Se ha elegido como sintipo de Oswaldella antarctica la especie más próxima a la descripción y figuras de Jäderholm (1904, 1905). Las otras dos especies están tan pobremente representadas que no es posible adscribirlas a ninguna especie conocida de Oswaldella ni asignarles un nuevo nombre específico, con lo que se denominan Oswaldella spec. 1 y spec.2.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Redescription of Oswaldella antarctica (Jäderholm, 1904) (Cnidaria Hydrozoa) with notes on related species (Notes on Antarctic hydroids, I) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 69) (Issue 25)
